title: Fluffy's Flight
description: Help Fluffy, the baby parrot, safely bounce down a spinning tree in this addictive arcade game! Built in Unity with multi-auth login, leaderboard, and ad monetization. Available on Google Play.
longDescription: Fluffy's Flight is a charming arcade game that takes players on an endless descent with Fluffy, an adorable baby parrot, as it overcomes its fear of heights. Inspired by the core mechanics of Helix Jump, players swipe to rotate a 3D tree structure, guiding Fluffy through safe openings while avoiding broken bricks and gaps. Developed using Unity, I handled the complete game development cycle, from concept to deployment, including implementing physics-based movement, procedural level generation, and integrating multi-platform login, cloud save, and real-time leaderboards. The game also features monetization through Unity LevelPlay with IronSource and ad placements. Published successfully on the Google Play Store, Fluffy's Flight combines immersive gameplay, colorful visuals, and relaxing music to offer a skill-based, addictive experience suitable for all ages.

title: Dilmah Legacy of the Leaf
description: Immersive mini-game collection exploring the heritage of tea through engaging challenges
longDescription: Dilmah Legacy of the Leaf is an interactive mobile game featuring 9 thoughtfully crafted mini-games that bring to life the journey of tea from leaf to cup. Developed using Unity, this project was designed to engage users with stories of sustainability, craftsmanship, and flavor. 8 of the 9 mini-games are completed, and the final one is in progress.

miniGames.title: Tea Pluckers' Dash
miniGames.description: Race through lush tea fields to pluck the freshest leaves while avoiding obstacles.

miniGames.title: Factory Sorter
miniGames.description: Sort tea leaves by quality as they rush down conveyor belts in a fast-paced puzzle.

miniGames.title: Flavor Mixer
miniGames.description: Mix and match ingredients to create the perfect Dilmah blend.

miniGames.title: Label Designer
miniGames.description: Unleash your creativity and design beautiful, thematic tea labels.

miniGames.title: Tea Tasting Challenge
miniGames.description: Taste, identify, and rate teas based on aroma, flavor, and color.

miniGames.title: Heritage Puzzle
miniGames.description: Solve cultural and historical puzzles related to the origins of tea.

miniGames.title: Sustainability Sprint
miniGames.description: Make fast eco-friendly choices to maintain a sustainable tea garden.

miniGames.title: Tea Quiz Master
miniGames.description: Test your knowledge of tea with a fast-paced, fun quiz game.

miniGames.title: Final Brew (Coming Soon)
miniGames.description: A surprise final game that brings together everything you've learned.

title: Frogged Out
description: Solve hilarious meme puzzles before time runs out!
longDescription: Jigsaw Memes is a 2D Unity puzzle game where your favorite internet memes are broken into pieces. Your goal? Complete each jigsaw puzzle before the timer hits zero. With a variety of meme-based puzzles that get trickier as you progress, this game blends classic jigsaw gameplay with meme humor for a fun and frantic experience. It’s a race against time—and laughter.

title: Find The Beast
longDescription: Find The Beast is a 2D hypercasual arcade game developed in Unity, inspired by viral internet memes of Mr. Beast and Mr. Lean. Players must quickly identify and tap on the real Mr. Beast as he moves among a swarm of identical-looking Mr. Lean faces. With each level, the game increases in speed and complexity—introducing more distractions and challenging the player's reflexes. Designed for quick, addictive gameplay and meme lovers, it's a perfect mix of humor and challenge.

title: Dictator Sprint
description: Fast-paced 2D runner where Aladeen shoots rivals on the track
longDescription: Inspired by the movie 'The Dictator', Dictator Sprint is a hilarious and chaotic 2D Unity game where you play as General Aladeen sprinting down an Olympic track. As other runners try to overtake you, take them down with pinpoint shots to maintain your lead. With simple controls, exaggerated animations, and over-the-top action, this satirical arcade game delivers fast-paced fun and political absurdity in equal measure.

title: Meme Infection
description: Tap to stop the zombie meme outbreak before it spreads!
longDescription: Meme Infection is a fast-paced 2D strategy game where a single infected meme becomes patient zero in a viral zombie outbreak. As the infection spreads across your favorite meme characters—moving up, down, left, or right—you must act quickly. Tap or click on zombies to eliminate them before they infect the entire board. It's a race against time: wipe out all the zombies before the memes are lost forever!

title: Hasbulla's Makeover
description: Give Hasbulla an instant makeover—perfectly time the mustache drop!
longDescription: Hasbulla's Makeover is a hilarious timing-based 2D Unity game where Hasbulla Magomedov’s iconic baby face awaits your touch of style. A cartoon mustache and wig swing left and right across his face, and it’s up to you to tap at the perfect moment. Land the accessories right where they belong to give Hasbulla an aged, gentlemanly look. Nail the alignment to score points, but miss—and it's a hilarious fail. Simple, absurd, and addictively fun.

title: Brain Rain
description: Brains are falling. catch them or be left brainless in this viral meme-inspired reflex game.
longDescription: Brain Rain is a fun and fast-paced 2D Unity game inspired by the viral 'hey you dropped this 🧠' meme. Players control a stick figure character who must move left and right to catch falling brains. Miss a brain, and it's game over. With increasing difficulty and speed, this hypercasual game tests your reflexes while delivering meme-fueled humor. Designed for short, engaging sessions, it’s perfect for mobile or web platforms.
